Moderate; Low</baseline> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <control_definition>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  The organization requests that the individual or individual’s authorized representative revalidate that PII collected is still accurate no less often than once every 365 days or as directed by the Data Integrity Board.</control_definition> <control_family display_value="Data Quality and Integrity">8f87bdfcdb211010280df36f29961906</control_family> <control_name>Re-Validate PII</control_name> <control_number>DI-01(02)</control_number> <control_type>Mandatory Enhancement</control_type> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description/> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_id>DI-01</group_id> <group_list/> <high>true</high> <impact>3</impact> <implementation_standards>Systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  High & Moderate:  PRIV.1 - Revalidation must occur as frequently as is necessary to ensure the PII is accurate, relevant, timely</implementation_standards> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <low>true</low> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <moderate>true</moderate> <number>ARSC0011256</number> <opened_at>2020-06-19 13:21:33</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <priority>3</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <reference_policy>Code: 5 U.S.C. §552a(e)(5;); OMB Circular A-130: 7.g. and 8.a.9;</reference_policy> <rejection_goto/> <related_controls/> <service_offering/> <short_description/> <sla_due/> <standard>NIST-800</standard> <state>1</state> <supplemental_guidance>Guidance for systems processing, storing, or transmitting PII (to include PHI):  Re-validation of PII used to determine a right, benefit, or privilege for an individual, is necessary to ensure the determination is based on the most accurate, timely, and relevant information. Frequency of revalidation should be commensurate with the impact to an individual's rights, benefits, or privileges as determined by the system owner in consultation with the organization's privacy office.</supplemental_guidance> <sys_class_name>x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-06-19 13:21:33</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>09ff3d105f231000b12e3572f2b4775d</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>!!!/!!!/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>8787bdfcdb211010280df36f2996190b</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-06-19 13:21:33</sys_updated_on> <task_for/> <time_worked/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_415531_rapid_ato_ars_3_1> </record_update>
